awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 nominations.

fullplot: This film is actually two one hour stories, the first based on a Stephen King story called the "Chattery Teeth" about a man who picks up a hitchhiker and the second is based on a Clive Barker story called "The Body Politic" about hands that rebel against the body.
plot: Two tales of terror, told by a travelling showman.
title: Quicksilver Highway
